Getting Started

Welcome to Your Projects at IBM

This guide will help you get started with the platform, regardless of your role.

Quick Start by Role

  • Executives
  • Managers
  • Interns

5-Minute Setup

  1. Log In
    • Visit https://your-projects-np.dinero.techzone.ibm.com/
    • Authenticate with IBM SSO
    • Automatic role detection
  2. Configure BYOK (Optional)
    • Click Settings icon (top right)
    • Add watsonx.ai API key
    • Add Watson Orchestrate credentials
    • Test connections
  3. Explore Dashboard
    • Navigate to Executive Dashboard
    • Review key metrics
    • Explore analytics charts
  4. Create Your First Ambition
    • Go to Leadership ‚Üí Ambitions
    • Click Create Ambition
    • Fill in strategic details
    • Submit
  5. Next Steps
    • Read Executive Guide
    • Create projects
    • Review applications

5-Minute Setup

  1. Log In
    • Visit the platform
    • Authenticate with SSO
    • Access Manager Dashboard
  2. Review Dashboard
    • See your projects section
    • Check application notifications
    • Familiarize with layout
  3. Create Your First Project
    • Go to Leadership ‚Üí Projects
    • Click Create Project
    • Write compelling description
    • Define requirements
    • Publish
  4. Set Up Notifications
    • Enable email notifications
    • Configure alert preferences
    • Set review schedule
  5. Next Steps
    • Read Manager Guide
    • Review applications
    • Use AI resume matcher

5-Minute Setup

  1. Log In
    • Visit the platform
    • Authenticate with SSO
    • Access Personal Dashboard
  2. Complete Your Profile
    • Add personal information
    • List your skills
    • Upload resume (PDF/DOCX)
    • Add career interests
  3. Browse Projects
    • Go to Projects tab
    • Filter by your skills
    • Read project descriptions
    • Bookmark interesting ones
  4. Apply to Projects
    • Select a project
    • Review requirements
    • Click Apply
    • Add optional cover message
    • Submit
  5. Next Steps
    • Read Intern Guide
    • Track applications
    • Update profile regularly

Platform Navigation

Main Navigation Menu

Top Navigation Bar

  • Home: Return to dashboard
  • Projects: Browse all projects (interns) or manage projects (leaders)
  • Leadership: Create ambitions and projects (leaders only)
  • Executive Dashboard: View analytics (executives only)
  • Settings: Configure BYOK and preferences

User Menu (Top Right)

  • Profile information
  • Role badge (color-coded)
  • Settings access
  • Logout option

Dashboard Overview

Executive Dashboard - Organization-wide metrics - Project portfolio health - Talent pipeline analytics - AI resume matching

Manager Dashboard - Your projects - Application reviews - Project performance - Quick actions

Personal Dashboard - Available projects - Your applications - Recommendations - Profile status

Key Concepts

Ambitions

What are they? Strategic initiatives that align with organizational goals. Multiple projects can support a single ambition.

Who creates them? Executives and senior leaders

Example: ‚ÄúTransform customer service with AI‚Äù (ambition) ‚Üí Multiple chatbot and automation projects

Projects

What are they? Specific opportunities for interns to contribute to meaningful work.

Who creates them? Executives and managers

Example: ‚ÄúBuild AI Chatbot for Customer Support‚Äù - 3 month project, needs 2 interns with Python/NLP skills

Applications

What are they? Intern submissions expressing interest in specific projects.

Process: Intern applies ‚Üí Manager reviews ‚Üí Accept/Decline ‚Üí Onboarding

BYOK (Bring Your Own Key)

What is it? Ability to use your own IBM API keys for watsonx.ai and Watson Orchestrate.

Benefits: - Enhanced security - Cost control - Custom configurations - Audit trail

Common Workflows

Creating and Staffing a Project

Intern Application Journey

System Requirements

Browser Support

Recommended Browsers: - Chrome 90+ - Firefox 88+ - Safari 14+ - Edge 90+

Not Supported: - Internet Explorer - Older browser versions

Device Requirements

Desktop/Laptop: - Minimum 1280x720 resolution - Stable internet connection - Modern browser

Mobile: - Responsive design - Touch-friendly interface - iOS 13+ or Android 9+

Network Requirements

Bandwidth: - Minimum: 1 Mbps - Recommended: 5+ Mbps

Firewall: - Allow access to .ibm.com - Allow access to .techzone.ibm.com - WebSocket support required

Authentication

IBM SSO

How It Works: 1. Navigate to platform URL 2. Redirected to IBM authentication 3. Enter IBM credentials 4. Automatic role assignment 5. Redirected to dashboard

Troubleshooting: - Clear browser cookies - Try incognito/private mode - Verify IBM credentials - Contact IT support

Role Assignment

Automatic Detection: - Based on IBM organizational data - Assigned at first login - Updated periodically

Role Types: - Executive: Strategic leaders - Manager: Team leaders - Intern: Talent pool

Getting Help

Documentation

User Guides: - Executive Guide - Manager Guide - Intern Guide

Reference: - Key Features - API Reference - Troubleshooting

Support Channels

In-App Help: - Watson Orchestrate chatbot - Help icon in navigation - Contextual tooltips

IT Support: - Email: support@ibm.com - Slack: #your-projects-support - Phone: 1-800-IBM-HELP

Community: - User forums - Best practices wiki - Video tutorials

Best Practices

For All Users

Security: - Never share credentials - Log out when done - Use BYOK for sensitive operations - Report suspicious activity

Communication: - Respond promptly - Be professional - Provide constructive feedback - Keep information updated

Data Quality: - Keep profiles current - Verify information accuracy - Update regularly - Complete all required fields

Platform Etiquette

Do: - ‚úÖ Be respectful - ‚úÖ Communicate clearly - ‚úÖ Follow guidelines - ‚úÖ Provide feedback - ‚úÖ Help others

Don‚Äôt: - ‚ùå Spam applications - ‚ùå Misrepresent skills - ‚ùå Ignore communications - ‚ùå Share confidential info - ‚ùå Abuse the system
